sentences.english: My father was the presiding judge in a case involving a man charged with tax evasion.
sentences.chinese: 我父親是一宗一男子逃稅案的主法官。

sentences.english: Neymar has also been dogged by allegations related to tax evasion.
sentences.chinese: 內馬爾還被有關逃稅的指控纏身。

sentences.english: Mrs. Pojaman was convicted last month of tax evasion and released on bail.
sentences.chinese: 他信夫人上個月被認定犯有逃稅罪，交保候審。

sentences.english: He avoided paying tax for three consecutive years by doctoring his accounts.
sentences.chinese: 他以做假賬的手法連續三年逃稅。

sentences.english: Don’t vote if you support 90 day detention without charge.
sentences.chinese: 別投票，如果你支持億萬富翁的偷逃稅行爲。

sentences.english: Many small firms operate under the radar of officialdom, dodging taxes and ignoring rules to survive.
sentences.chinese: 很多小公司，在逃稅和違規中求生存。

sentences.english: It too came to naught, when Mr Yang was arrested in China for tax evasion.
sentences.chinese: 它最後也夭折，當時楊斌因爲在中國逃稅而被逮捕。

sentences.english: Mr. Hai was rearrested after completing an earlier sentence for tax evasion.
sentences.chinese: 海先生是在因逃稅服刑完畢後再次遭到逮捕的。

sentences.english: These two shopkeepers are in prison for tax evasion.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個店主因逃稅而坐牢。

sentences.english: We all know that cheating on our taxes is a no-no.
sentences.chinese: 我們都知道偷逃稅是絕對不行的。

sentences.english: This new law amounts to a tax evader's charter.
sentences.chinese: 這項新法律簡直成了爲逃稅者開的許可證。

sentences.english: These two shopkeepers are in prison for tax evasion.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個店東因逃稅而坐牢。

sentences.english: But a social inclination toward tax evasion, once established, is hard to eradicate.
sentences.chinese: 不過逃稅的社會傾向一旦建立，再改就難了。

sentences.english: Each has been branded a tax dodger by activists.
sentences.chinese: 全都被社會活動分子貼上了逃稅者的標籤。

sentences.english: The former Yukos president was arrested in 2003 and charged with fraud and tax evasion.(See photo)
sentences.chinese: 霍氏曾在2003年因欺詐和逃稅獲刑8年。

sentences.english: Have you ever renounced United States citizenship for the purpose of avoiding taxation?
sentences.chinese: 您能否已經以逃稅爲手法而放棄美國雄民身份？
